p: The discarded black tea leaves were collected from Mama Restaurant located nearby Universiti Putra Malaysia, Malaysia. PFAD was supplied by Sime Darby Jomalina Sdn Bhd, Malaysia. Methanol (≥99.6%), ethanol (96%), sulfuric acid (96–98%), phosphoric acid (≥98%) of ACS grade was procured from Merck, Malaysia. The fatty acid methyl esters standards were obtained from Sigma Aldrich, Malaysia.
